snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 428: Josef the Hedgehog (SAGE2014 Act 2)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Josef the Hedgehog - SAGE2014 Act 2
Credit: Jomaster (Possibly)
Release Date: August 3rd, 2014

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Title&Stuff
01:46 - Character Select
01:56 - Seasalt City Hub
03:44 - Seasalt Coast Act 1
07:37 - Seasalt City Hub Extra
08:32 - Second Character Gameplay
10:57 - Sonic Skin Brief
11:49 - Ultima Stage

NOTES: Last time we took a look at Flash, now we pay a visit to Josef and his... Brother?
I don't know too much about the description or Story behind this game so time to improvise.
Josef a person with a jump height not that great but enough Boost Power to compensate.
Ventured off to Seasalt City to relax only to find out the Hotel is full OH NO!
Confused what to do next he tried to read the sign posts only to notice the letters are made out of holes.
So all he could see was the backdrop sky, being mildly annoyed by this fact he needed to relax.
So he went on a stroll to the Coast to uh... Do something or Other...
MEANWHILE His brother "Greensef?...Ye no" Now with better jump height & projectile power.
Comes barging in storms through the City not giving a single damn about anything
Ventures off to the Coast like it's nothing and rampages through it and makes his way into ULTIMA!
The ultimate Digital Nukemy Dukemy 2-...3D! experience! With the goal in mind to uh... do something...
Overall this is a story of The Something that went to do something for the sake of The Something.
Yes "The Something" and not just "Something" there is a clear difference in the "Somethings"
We cannot confuse the two.
*COUGH*
SO ANYWAY this a simple Advance like game with slightly questionable hitboxes when homing in on enemies.
Wall jumping could be slightly better, it's short, has some Extra features of Sonic sprite just a recolor really.
And a bonus stage with ye old classic music that many know.
Two playable chars one with less jump but more speed and the other with more jump less speed and projectiles.
NOICE!
